item-not-available: This item is no longer available

loan-counter.title: Make Offer
loan-counter.offer-title: What would you like to do?
loan-counter.offer-subtitle: Enter the details here and we’ll send it to the user.

fund-loan-modal.title: Fund Loan Listing
fund-loan-modal.question: Are you sure you’d like to fund listing from {{username}} ?
fund-loan-modal.note: Feel free to send include a message. How exciting!
fund-loan-modal.radio-text: Yes, I’m absolutely sure. Fund this listing!

remove-modal.title: Remove listing
remove-modal.answer: This action cannot be undone and you will lose any current counter offers! To proceed with the removal, make a selection below.
remove-modal.question: Are you sure you’d like to remove this listing?
remove-modal.radio-text: Yes, I’m absolutely sure. Please remove my listing!
remove-modal.removal-successful: Your listing has been successfully removed!
remove-modal.create-listing-suggestion: Feel free to create another listing at any time

submit-loan-offer-modal.title: Send Loan Offer
submit-loan-offer-modal.question: Are you sure you’d like to offer the items below?
submit-loan-offer-modal.answer: You’ll be able to remove your offer but only if its not accepted by the listing owner.

submit-loan-offer-success-modal.title: Submit counter offer
submit-loan-offer-success-modal.question: You’ve successfully sent {{username}} your offer!
submit-loan-offer-success-modal.note: We’ve sent them a message, so hang tight as they take a look.
